MS MCQs

    Defend against threats in Teams

    »

    1. Which of these examples is part of the Cloud App Security framework?

      Identity cyber threats in your Shadow IT

      Discover and control the use of Shadow IT

      Assess the compliance of your Shadow IT


    2. Which three services are part of Microsoft Defender?

      Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Defender for Identity, Microsoft Cloud App Security

      Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Conditional Access, Microsoft Cloud App Security

      Conditional Access, Compliance and Security, Microsoft Cloud App Security


    3. What security model does Conditional Access comply with?

      Perimeter security

      Zero Trust security model

      Role-based access control


    4. Which Microsoft security service includes next generation antivirus protection?

      Conditional Access

      Microsoft 365 Defender

      Cloud app security
